title: Boston Celtics concession stand prices ( beer , soft drink , hot dog ) 2010 to 2016
summary: This is a multi-line chart with 3 lines representing Beer, Soft drink, and Hot dog. The y axis denotes Sales price in USD and the x axis denotes Year.
Overall Beer, Soft drink, and Hot dog are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Beer, 2. Hot dog, and lastly, 3. Soft drink.
Overall across the Year, Beer mostly maintained the highest Sales price in USD when compared to others with a mean value of 7.96, and it peaked at 2014/15, and 2015/16.
After Beer, Hot dog overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 5.0, peaking at 2015/16.
The botommost line, Soft drink,  has a mean of 4.5, and peaked at 2013/14.
min_summary: This is a multi-line chart with 3 lines representing Beer, Soft drink, and Hot dog. The y axis denotes Sales price in USD and the x axis denotes Year.
Overall Beer, Soft drink, and Hot dog are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
Throughout the period, Beer generally had the highest Sales price in USD relative to others with an average of 7.96, and it reached its maximum at 2014/15, and 2015/16 with a value of 8.5.
After Beer, Hot dog overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 5.0, peaking at 2015/16.
Soft drink mostly had the least Sales price in USD with a mean value of 4.5, which peaked at 2013/14 with a value of 5.5.
